channel.title: Kainexus on Steve Good
channel.description: Recent content in Kainexus on Steve Good

item.title: New KaiNexus Video
item.description: KaiNexus, the company where I am the Principal Architect, has just released our latest “Explainer” video. The new video includes 3 use cases and a bunch of screen grabs from the actual software. This video is quite exciting as I think it really shows what kinds of problems our software solves. Check it out!
